EmailTemplate.description: Notification is generated when system automatically changes the BX009 Status to 'Completed'
EmailTemplate.name: GMPL/ BX009: BX009 that has been completed
EmailTemplate.subject: BX009 named '{!GMPL_BX009__c.Project__c}' has been Completed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi, The BX009 named '{!GMPL_BX009__c.Project__c}' has been Completed. The BX009 can be accessed via {!GMPL_BX009__c.Link}.
Thanks.
